snippet: Corrections appearing in print on December 21, 2011.
A day after Apple won a legal victory against HTC, a preliminary ruling found that Motorola Mobility Holdings was violating a Microsoft patent with its mobile products.
abstract: A day after Apple won a legal victory against HTC, a preliminary ruling found that Motorola Mobility Holdings was violating a Microsoft patent with its mobile products.

headline.main: Microsoft Follows Apple With Victory Against Android

snippet: A day after Apple won a legal victory against HTC, the United States International Trade Commission issued a preliminary ruling finding that Motorola Mobility Holdings was violating a Microsoft patent with its mobile products. The ruling still mus...
abstract: A day after Apple won a legal victory against HTC, the United States International Trade Commission issued a preliminary ruling finding that Motorola Mobility Holdings was violating a Microsoft patent with its mobile products. The ruling still must be reviewed by a six-member commission, which can chose to reverse the judge's preliminary decision.

headline.main: Microsoft Follows Apple With Victory Against Android

snippet: Kayak, a plane-booking service, has released an upgrade for its iPad app, adding car reservation and trip-planning tools while introducing a brand-new design.
abstract: Kayak, a plane-booking service, has released an upgrade for its iPad app, adding car reservation and trip-planning tools while introducing a brand-new design.

headline.main: Kayak iPad App Now Reserves Cars and Plans Trips

snippet: The Guilty Goose, a brasserie-style restaurant, will take care of the succulent, beautifully burnished free-range bird for you.

snippet: The reporters and editors of The New York Times are always searching for the most interesting items on the Web. On Tuesday, they found Facebook's new headquarters evaluated, measures of Google+ followers questioned and a tech analyst lauded.
